string-array.name: appointment_note
string-array.item: Please fill in information relate to the patient!

string-array.name: deposit_required
string-array.item: RM 50 deposit is required to make appointment, please make sure you have enough balance in your account!

string-array.name: otp_warning
string-array.item: OTP is required to reload money, please make sure your phone number is correct!

string-array.name: max_reload_warning
string-array.item: Maximum of 5 time can be reload for each day, please input all the field carefully!

string-array.name: email_warning
string-array.item: Changes in email need to verify again in order to login, please make sure that email input is correct!

string-array.name: email_warning_2
string-array.item: Please input an existed Email in order to verify your account!
